content: Captain Lotus-Vision is one of the four captains you can find in Chapter 3, and is an optional Yaoguai Chief you can encounter in the Pagoda Realm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Lotus-Vision', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
Captain Lotus-Vision is one of the four captains you can find in Chapter 3, and is an optional Yaoguai Chief you can encounter in the Pagoda Realm.
